query:
SELECT 
  m.id as meal_id,
  m.aiDescription,
  m.calories,
  m.loggedAt,
  'meal' as type
FROM meals m
WHERE m.clientId = (SELECT id FROM clients WHERE userId = 222222)
ORDER BY m.loggedAt DESC
LIMIT 50;

SELECT 
  d.id as drink_id,
  d.drinkType,
  d.calories,
  d.loggedAt,
  'drink' as type
FROM drinks d
WHERE d.clientId = (SELECT id FROM clients WHERE userId = 222222)
ORDER BY d.loggedAt DESC
LIMIT 50;
